tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to miss; hence (figuratively and generally) to sin; by inference, to forfeit, lack, expiate, repent, (causatively) lead astray, condemn

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)

tokens.resolved_gloss: depressed (figuratively), in mind (gentle) or circumstances (needy, especially saintly)
